create_domain.description: Add a new domain to your DigitalOcean account.

props.name: name
props.description: The domain name (e.g., example.com).

props.name: ip_address
props.description: Optional IP address to create an A record pointing to the apex domain.

create_droplet.description: Create a new Droplet or multiple Droplets.

props.name: creation_mode
props.description: Create a single Droplet or multiple Droplets at once.

props.name: name
props.description: Name for the Droplet (e.g., example.com).

props.name: names
props.description: Names for multiple Droplets (up to 10).

props.name: region
props.description: Region to deploy the Droplet.

props.name: size
props.description: Droplet size (CPU, RAM, disk).

props.name: image
props.description: Base image for the Droplet.

props.name: ssh_keys
props.description: SSH keys to embed in the Droplet.

props.name: vpc_uuid
props.description: VPC network for the Droplet.

props.name: backups
props.description: Enable automated backups.

props.name: ipv6
props.description: Enable IPv6 networking.

props.name: monitoring
props.description: Install the DigitalOcean monitoring agent.

props.name: tags
props.description: Tags to apply to the Droplet.

props.name: user_data
props.description: Cloud-init script or user data (max 64 KiB).

props.name: with_droplet_agent
props.description: Install agent for web console access.

delete_domain.description: Remove a domain from your DigitalOcean account.

props.name: domain_name
props.description: The domain name to delete (e.g., example.com).

props.name: droplet_id
props.description: Select the Droplet to delete.

get_domain.description: Retrieve details about a specific domain.

props.name: domain_name
props.description: The domain name to retrieve (e.g., example.com).

get_droplet.description: Retrieve details about a specific Droplet.

props.name: droplet_id
props.description: Select the Droplet to retrieve.

list_database_clusters.description: Retrieve a list of all database clusters in your account.

props.name: tag_name
props.description: Filter database clusters by a specific tag.

list_database_events.description: Retrieve all event logs for a database cluster.

props.name: database_cluster_uuid
props.description: Select the database cluster.

list_domains.description: Retrieve a list of all domains in your account.

props.name: per_page
props.description: Number of domains to return per page (1-200).

props.name: page
props.description: Which page of results to return.

list_droplets.description: Retrieve a list of all Droplets in your account.

props.name: per_page
props.description: Number of Droplets to return per page (1-200).

props.name: page
props.description: Which page of results to return.

props.name: tag_name
props.description: Filter Droplets by a specific tag. Cannot be combined with Name or Type.

props.name: name
props.description: Filter by exact Droplet name (case-insensitive). Cannot be combined with Tag Name.

props.name: type
props.description: Filter by Droplet type. Cannot be combined with Tag Name.
